name: Interstellar Construct: Shear Structure
desc: Characters deal 10% increased Quake DMG to their target enemy, and enemies adjacent to it also take Quake DMG equal to 25% of DMG dealt to the primary target enemy.
enhanced_desc: Characters deal 15% increased Quake DMG to their target, and other targets also take Quake DMG equal to 30% of DMG dealt to the primary target enemy.
